description:
Rock, paper, notebook. Made with limestone and resin that has a beautiful non-friction surface for a smooth glide. Waterproof and tear-resistant pages let you take it from the amazon to the desert with confidence.

  • Made of limestone and non-toxic resin that requires less energy to create but saves trees while doing it
  • 144 pages of 120-micron thick paper make this notebook a joy to write on
  • Waterproof cover and pages make this a notebook you can take anywhere
  • Tear resistant pages mean you won’t be able to blame the family pet anymore
  • Thread bound lays flat and no bleed though pages create a good-looking note taker, regardless of the utensil
  • Rounded corners, divider ribbon and back pocket make this a complete package
name: Stone Paper Waterproof A5 Casebound Notebook Lined
